it.polimi.automata.transition.impl

Class ModelTransitionFactoryImpl<LABEL extends Label>

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.automata.transition.impl.ClaimTransitionFactoryImpl<LABEL>
      • it.polimi.automata.transition.impl.ModelTransitionFactoryImpl<LABEL>
  • Type Parameters:
    LABEL - is the type of the label of the transitions depending on whether the automaton represents the model or the claim it is a set of proposition or a propositional logic formula Label
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    TransitionFactory<LABEL,Transition<LABEL>>, org.apache.commons.collections15.Factory<Transition<LABEL>>

    public class ModelTransitionFactoryImpl<LABEL extends Label>
extends ClaimTransitionFactoryImpl<LABEL>
    is the factory that allows to create transitions of the type Transition
    Author:
    claudiomenghi
    See Also:
    Transition}. It implements the {@link TransitionFactory} interface

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public Transition<LABEL> create(java.util.Set<LABEL> labels)
        creates a new transition labeled with the specified condition
        also guarantees that no transition with a negated proposition is created
        Specified by:
        create in interface TransitionFactory<LABEL extends Label,Transition<LABEL extends Label>>
        Overrides:
        create in class ClaimTransitionFactoryImpl<LABEL extends Label>
        Parameters:
        labels - are the labels of the transitions. If one of the labels is satisfied the transition may be fired
        Returns:
        a new transition labeled with the specified condition
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if one of the proposition in the label is negated

      • create

        public Transition<LABEL> create(int id,
                       java.util.Set<LABEL> labels)
        creates a new transition with the specified condition and id
        also guarantees that no transition with a negated proposition is created
        Specified by:
        create in interface TransitionFactory<LABEL extends Label,Transition<LABEL extends Label>>
        Overrides:
        create in class ClaimTransitionFactoryImpl<LABEL extends Label>
        Parameters:
        id - is the id of the transition
        labels - are the labels of the transitions. If one of the labels is satisfied the transition may be fired
        Returns:
        a new transition with the specified id and condition as label
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if one of the proposition in the label is negated
